data.message: The latest BETA update CONSTANTLY force closes. I'm having to use the browser just to send this message. I've uninstalled and reinstalled and reported like 100 times thru the app.

replies.message: Hi Chan. We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this and we appreciate you reporting it to us. Due to the volume of reports we receive, you may not receive a response but rest assured we do read every report. Thank you for your patience. -Jessica
Hi chan .Can you please help promote my Facebook page
I thought it was my phone! It's driving me insane. I finally think I can do something and bam! It closed and takes me to the pulsating F and then goes right back to my newsfeed.
